Manager of Command Channel Instance Zones Bellra:
Welcome! My name is Bellra, I help adventurers enter command channel instance zones. I can help you get to Tauti, Frintezza, Octavis, Antharas and Spirit Seal.
Instance zones I'm in charge of are reset on Saturdays at 06:30. Don't forget that.
- Normal difficulty: Lv. 107, command channel of 21 or more characters
- Hard difficulty: Lv. 112, command channel of 21 or more characters
